evidence.text: The case concerns grant terminations by federal agencies and does not reference any court-appointed monitor. The Order Granting Motion for Preliminary Injunction (document read in Steps 4-5) contains no mention of a monitor, and the Docket (Step 3) shows no monitoring-related filings. All 11 documents in the corpus were reviewed for 'monitor' references (Step 2 search) with no relevant matches.
evidence.location: Document catalog review, Step 2 search, Step 4-5 document reads

evidence.text: No monitoring mechanism was established in this case. The Order Granting Motion for Preliminary Injunction (Step 4-5) orders compliance with the preliminary injunction but does not appoint a monitor or require monitoring reports. The Docket (Step 3) shows no motions or orders related to monitoring, and the case involves grant terminations without compliance monitoring requirements.
evidence.source_document: Order Granting Motion for Preliminary Injunction
evidence.location: Page 1-33 (entire document read), especially Sections II.A.2.a.iii (final agency action) and III (class certification)

args.reason: All checklist items are marked as Not Applicable with sufficient evidence from corpus-wide document review, including the Order Granting Motion for Preliminary Injunction which confirms no monitor was appointed.
